DOC.brief_summary: A multicenter study evaluate effectiveness teach strategy base incorporation educational game simulate setting versus usual practice base diffusion implementation clinical practice guideline Family Medicine Residency Program . The impact new strategy measure improve knowledge skill acquisition clinical decision make Family Medicine Residency Program 6 month . Effectiveness also measure month 12 month intervention .
DOC.brief_title: Effectiveness Educational Games Implementation Clinical Practice Guidelines Family Medicine Residents Spain .
DOC.detailed_description: Objective : To evaluate effectiveness educational game implementation practice guideline acquire skill clinical decision-making family medicine resident Spain . Secondary objective : To describe strategy utilized Residency Program Family Medicine Spain teach use practice guideline . To identify barrier facilitator use practice guideline family medicine resident . Setting : Unit Family Medicine Spain . Study design : Multicentric cluster randomise controlled clinical trial . Population : Family Medicine Residents second third year . Sample size : 394 resident ( 197 arm ) . The randomization unit unit ( cluster ) . The unit analysis professional ( resident ) . Variables : Main outcome variable measure group : ass skill level number correct answer clinical question diabetes , anxiety disorder , antibiotic prescription insomnia clinical practice guideline primary care . Sociodemographic variables educational variable subject variable regard Residency Program Family Medicine . Intervention : EDUCAGUIA plan . Incorporating educational game online guideline . Statistical Analysis : Primary secondary effectiveness . Adjusting contextual individual variable factor mixed effect model ( lineal regression ) ( dependent variable : point obtain educational game guide ) .
DOC.criteria: Second third year resident Family Medicine Program . Giving Family Medicine Program .
